RemediationStrings.Title: This Device is not joined to any active domain
RemediationStrings.Description: Device must be joined to an active domain. Please contact the IT helpdesk at (714) 571-3475

RemediationStrings.Title: This Device is not trusted by the WDS domain
RemediationStrings.Description: Device must be trusted by the WDS domain. Please contact the IT helpdesk at (714) 571-3475
